1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Functions for implementing the Koshucode calculator.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run
6  ( runFiles,
7    getProxies,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified System.Environment     as Env
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base   as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data   as D
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core   as C
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Writer as W
15
16
17-- | Read and union sections from files, and run the section.
18runFiles :: (D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => C.Global c -> [B.IOPoint] -> IO B.ExitCode
19runFiles g ns =
20    do (abRes, _) <- C.resReadPoints g ns
21       case abRes of
22         Left a    -> C.globalAbort g a
23         Right res -> case C.resRun res of
24                        Left a   -> C.globalAbort g a
25                        Right r  -> C.putResult r
26
27-- | Get proxy settings.
28--   This function looks environment variables
29--   of @http_proxy@, @https_proxy@, and @ftp_proxy@.
30getProxies :: IO [B.HttpProxy]
31getProxies =
32    do httpProxy   <- Env.lookupEnv "http_proxy"
33       httpsProxy  <- Env.lookupEnv "https_proxy"
34       ftpProxy    <- Env.lookupEnv "ftp_proxy"
35       return [ ("http"  , httpProxy)
36              , ("https" , httpsProxy)
37              , ("ftp"   , ftpProxy) ]
